title: Guillermo del Toro says his ‘Frankenstein’ is not an AI metaphor: ‘We live in a time of terror and intimidation’
description: Guillermo del Toro's reimagining of ‘Frankenstein’ stars Jacob Elordi as the Creature and Oscar Isaac as the scientist. title: As AI becomes part of everyday life, it brings a hidden climate cost
description: Marissa Loewen first started using artificial intelligence in 2014 as a project management tool.
